actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend section 107 of the River and Harbor Act of 1970.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to undertake a program to demonstrate the practicability of extending the navigation season on the Great Lakes and Saint Lawrence Seaway. Requires the Secretary to submit a report describing the results of such program no later than July 30, 1976. Authorizes to be appropriated to carry out such program an amount not to exceed $9,500,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 107 of the River and Harbor Act of 1970.
